intro: Lindmania schidosperma, commonly known as the pink hibiscus mealybug plant, is a species of flowering plant in the Malvaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its vibrant pink or red flowers and its ability to thrive in humid, warm climates. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its striking appearance. However, it is also known to host the pink hibiscus mealybug, which can be a pest in some regions.
